document_data.mainbody:
arrl Rider was a caravan worker employee of the Gallaway Trade Depot in the Ten Towns under the supervision of Rawleigh Gallaway, in the late 13 century DR.
Karrl was a human man with light skin and blonde hair. He wore a simple leather armor and carried a shortsword.
In the , Karrl Rider and Jemeliah accompanied Rawleigh Gallaways caravan to the town of Lonelywood. The business venture was cut short by a barbarian army that besieged the town, stopping the Gallaway Trading Coaster wagons from leaving. Karrl, Jemeliah, and Rawleigh Gallaway all were stuck until the barbarian threat was over.
